title: Authors and Citation

code: @Manual{,   title = {pinsqs: `qs` Multithreading Support for `pins`},   author = {Adam Shen},   year = {2024},   note = {https://adamoshen.github.io/pinsqs/, https://github.com/adamoshen/pinsqs}, }

title: `qs` Multithreading Support for `pins`
text: pinsqs provides convenience functions incorporate multithreaded reading writing .qs files qs package pins infrastructure. Motivated feature request plans implementation near future, felt bundling package benefit workflows.

title: `qs` Multithreading Support for `pins`
text: can install package using:

title: `qs` Multithreading Support for `pins`
text: Initialise pin board, usual: Create data pinned: Pin data board (.qs file): Checking contents pin board, usual: View pin metadata, usual: Read pinned data (.qs file):
code: library(tibble) library(magrittr) library(pins) library(pinsqs) board <- board_temp() rock <- datasets::rock %>%   as_tibble() board %>%   pin_qsave(     rock, "rock-tibble",     description = "`rock` data set as a tibble"   ) #> Creating new version '20241024T224708Z-d8ed3' board %>%   pin_search() #> # A tibble: 1 x 6 #>   name        type  title               created             file_size meta       #>   <chr>       <chr> <chr>               <dttm>              <fs::byt> <list>     #> 1 rock-tibble file  rock-tibble: a pin~ 2024-10-24 18:47:08     1.01K <pins_met> board %>%   pin_meta("rock-tibble") #> List of 13 #>  $ file       : chr "rock-tibble.qs" #>  $ file_size  : 'fs_bytes' int 1.01K #>  $ pin_hash   : chr "d8ed3112a49e9960" #>  $ type       : chr "file" #>  $ title      : chr "rock-tibble: a pinned .qs file" #>  $ description: chr "`rock` data set as a tibble" #>  $ tags       : NULL #>  $ urls       : NULL #>  $ created    : POSIXct[1:1], format: "2024-10-24 18:47:08" #>  $ api_version: int 1 #>  $ user       : list() #>  $ name       : chr "rock-tibble" #>  $ local      :List of 3 #>   ..$ dir    : 'fs_path' chr "C:/Users/Adam/AppData/Local/Temp/Rtmp0SoJbE/pins-ef8c62ec17fe/rock-tibble/20241024T224708Z-d8ed3" #>   ..$ url    : NULL #>   ..$ version: chr "20241024T224708Z-d8ed3" board %>%   pin_qread("rock-tibble") #> # A tibble: 48 x 4 #>     area  peri  shape  perm #>    <int> <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl> #>  1  4990 2792. 0.0903   6.3 #>  2  7002 3893. 0.149    6.3 #>  3  7558 3931. 0.183    6.3 #>  4  7352 3869. 0.117    6.3 #>  5  7943 3949. 0.122   17.1 #>  6  7979 4010. 0.167   17.1 #>  7  9333 4346. 0.190   17.1 #>  8  8209 4345. 0.164   17.1 #>  9  8393 3682. 0.204  119   #> 10  6425 3099. 0.162  119   #> # i 38 more rows

title: `qs` Multithreading Support for `pins`
text: value nthreads supplied pin_qread() pin_qsave(), default parallel::detectCores() / 2. Otherwise, parallel::detectCores() NA, fallback default qs package, 1.

title: pinsqs: `qs` Multithreading Support for `pins` — pinsqs-package
text: Provides convenience functions incorporate multithreaded reading writing `.qs` files `qs` package `pins` infrastructure.

title: pinsqs: `qs` Multithreading Support for `pins` — pinsqs-package
text: Maintainer: Adam Shen adam.shen@carleton.ca

what: Read and write .qs objects to and from a board — pin_qread
title: Read and write .qs objects to and from a board — pin_qread
text: Use pin_qsave() pin .qs object, use pin_qread() retrieve .

title: Read and write .qs objects to and from a board — pin_qread
code: pin_qread(board, name, nthreads = NULL, ...)  pin_qsave(board, x, name, nthreads = NULL, ...)

title: Read and write .qs objects to and from a board — pin_qread
text: board pin board, created pins::board_*() function. name Pin name. nthreads Number threads use. Defaults value returned parallel::detectCores() divided 2. parallel::detectCores() returns NA, fallback default 1. ... Additional arguments passed pins::pin_upload()/pins::pin_download(), methods specific board. includes additional fields title description. x object pin.

title: Read and write .qs objects to and from a board — pin_qread
code: library(tibble) library(magrittr) library(pins)  # Initialise the pin board, as usual board <- board_temp()  # Create data to be pinned rock <- datasets::rock %>%   as_tibble()  # Pin the data to the board (as a `.qs` file) board %>%   pin_qsave(     rock, "rock-tibble",     description="`rock` data set as a tibble"   ) #> Creating new version '20241024T224735Z-d8ed3'  # Checking the contents of our pin board, as usual board %>%   pin_search() #> # A tibble: 1 x 6 #>   name        type  title               created             file_size meta       #>   <chr>       <chr> <chr>               <dttm>              <fs::byt> <list>     #> 1 rock-tibble file  rock-tibble: a pin~ 2024-10-24 18:47:35     1.01K <pins_met>  # View pin metadata, as usual board %>%   pin_meta("rock-tibble") #> List of 13 #>  $ file       : chr "rock-tibble.qs" #>  $ file_size  : 'fs_bytes' int 1.01K #>  $ pin_hash   : chr "d8ed3112a49e9960" #>  $ type       : chr "file" #>  $ title      : chr "rock-tibble: a pinned .qs file" #>  $ description: chr "`rock` data set as a tibble" #>  $ tags       : NULL #>  $ urls       : NULL #>  $ created    : POSIXct[1:1], format: "2024-10-24 18:47:35" #>  $ api_version: int 1 #>  $ user       : list() #>  $ name       : chr "rock-tibble" #>  $ local      :List of 3 #>   ..$ dir    : 'fs_path' chr "C:/Users/Adam/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpIjThe0/pins-f64c5d283c8b/rock-tibble/20241024T224735Z-d8ed3" #>   ..$ url    : NULL #>   ..$ version: chr "20241024T224735Z-d8ed3"  # Read the pinned data (as a `.qs` file) from the board board %>%   pin_qread("rock-tibble") #> # A tibble: 48 x 4 #>     area  peri  shape  perm #>    <int> <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl> #>  1  4990 2792. 0.0903   6.3 #>  2  7002 3893. 0.149    6.3 #>  3  7558 3931. 0.183    6.3 #>  4  7352 3869. 0.117    6.3 #>  5  7943 3949. 0.122   17.1 #>  6  7979 4010. 0.167   17.1 #>  7  9333 4346. 0.190   17.1 #>  8  8209 4345. 0.164   17.1 #>  9  8393 3682. 0.204  119   #> 10  6425 3099. 0.162  119   #> # i 38 more rows
